en_text: For Oga-chan to say it surprised  him, that's really something!
jp_text: あの男鹿ちゃんが ビビったって言うんだから→
google_translated: Because that Oga-chan is talking about →

en_text: We brought you yogurti since  you're likely tired out.
jp_text: つかれてると思って ヨーグルッチも買ってきたんだからさ。
google_translated: I thought I was being used and I bought Yogurch.

en_text: Fine, then... Follow me! We're going home!
jp_text: フッ…仕方ねえな。 付いて来い！帰るぞ！
google_translated: Hook ... How to do it.Coming up!I will go back!

en_text: R-Right!
jp_text: はっ　はい！ そう来なくちゃね。
google_translated: Yes!I have no reason.
